import React from 'react' import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; const br = ( currentFormattedData) => { console.log(currentFormattedData) const { lat, lon } = currentFormattedData; const currentDate = new Date().toISOString(); return fetch(`https://api.brightsky.dev/weather?lat=${lat}&lon=${lon}&date=${currentDate}`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log('Bright Sky API Response:', data.weather); return data.weather; }); } function Details({h, currentFormattedData}) { const data = br(currentFormattedData); return (
